Reviews.Title: Smaller than is seems
Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: Smaller than it seems, which is actually better to hide them, sound is clear, i just installed them, let's try them

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: jonnii
Reviews.Content: I have Defender Security Cameras for home use. Defender doesn't have the microphone come with it so I ordered this mic and it works fine. I can hear people talking across the street from my house. I can hear cars driving by and people stop at or near my house. Great little microphone and I would recommend it for anyone to use it at home.

Reviews.Title: very sensitive
Reviews.Author: Zborn
Reviews.Content: This microphone works well, and is capable of hearing a wide range.  It seems to be specifically designed in the range of the human voice.  It is defiantly not high fidelity or for recording complex ranges of audio like music or other sounds with verity, although if your neighbor is playing some music it might pick it up.  The cable run is long but be prepared with enough plugs if you use a power-strip like I do.  As advertised, it is not made for outdoors.  I have it mounted under the eve of the house outside and it so far has been working perfectly.  It would be nice to have something available with more directional properties.

Reviews.Title: Great range
Reviews.Author: Jean-Pierre Giagnoli
Reviews.Content: Great range and even great sound. Got if for my DVR system and I could not be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Works as described
Reviews.Author: S. Haynes
Reviews.Content: This microphone works well.  You can hear someone outside live provided you have your monitor connected for sound, hear sound in playback, or over the internet.I used a 4-way splitter that I had left over from the original camera installation instead of the supplied plug and added it to my camera system power supply to eliminate an extra thing to plug. I wish I had installed a microphone when I installed the cameras so that I could have run all the cable at the same time.  Realized it's nice to have a microphone at the front door.

Reviews.Title: Very sensitive
Reviews.Author: No Name
Reviews.Content: It is way to sensitive to sound, but can heat people talking from a distance. I have to fashion a level control to cut the gain down and it worked well, not perfect but good enough.

Reviews.Title: Nice kit, sound not so good.
Reviews.Author: B Yung
Reviews.Content: Everything is included. Enough wire to place the mic in the best location. Build quality appears good. Sound quality was not so good. I tested with my wife using the phone app from long distance. Even knowing her voice and what she was about to say, it was difficult understand her when see was just 10 ft from the mic. It can pick up noise from other rooms, but not sure how useful those sounds would be if indistinguishable. Maybe if needed the police could enhance the sound to better understand, but the quality too very low for most any use for me. I am keeping it, since it may be useful under the right conditions.
